text: kitchen conundrum is about answering
questions and giving you solutions to
the common dilemmas we face in the
kitchen every single day understanding
why things happen will help you to avoid
them from happening again or how to fix
them
I'll even answer some kitchen conundrums
may have not even thought of brown
butter makes everything delicious from
vegetables to pastas cakes to cookies it
really adds that nutty flavor that
everybody loves well it's relatively
simple to make it can go from something
like this to burnt in no time at all
however you don't have to start over
there's a really simple way to fix it
two sticks of unsalted butter low heat
once the butter starts melting you can
see it separates into the milk solids
and the butter fat and the milk solids
will eventually sink to the bottom of
the pan and brown up nicely and that's
what gives you the wonderful flavor this
is the perfect opportunity for you to
take it off the heat and scrape it into
a bowl to stop the cooking process if it
does burn take it off the heat strain it
through a coffee filter all of the burnt
bitter milk solids are gonna stay in the
coffee filter and what you're left with
is a beautiful tasty brown butter that
you're glad you didn't throw away and
your kitchen conundrum has been avoided
